amendatorysection.catchline: Office of Parole Administration; provide access to records, reports, and documents.
amendatorysection.para: The Office of Parole Administration shall provide the Public Counsel and the Inspector General with direct computer access to all computerized records, reports, and documents maintained by the office in connection with administration of the Nebraska parole system, except that access for the Public Counsel and the Inspector General to a parolee’s medical or mental health records shall be subject to the parolee’s consent.
